html:
6.3.24  1:08 pm   what's the strangest adjective you can think of?

      fine

6.3.24  11:38 am   I have to write 2 songs this week for a hard deadline. What should I do?

      write 2 songs

6.3.24  11:15 am   can i bend space and time as long as i straighten it back out afterwards

      try to straighten it before

6.3.24  9:44 am   at the top left, why is the word is "ueqstions" not "questions".

      it's not "ueqstions", it's ueqstions

6.3.24  8:58 am   what is your life motto

      'have a nice day'

6.3.24  8:25 am   can I please have a new tip of the day

      'have a nice day'

6.3.24  6:20 am   How do you feel about Tetris? Too many blocks? Not enough circles? The right kinds/amounts of shapes?

      it's a little late to change tetris now

6.3.24  3:46 am   hey bill the drummers are really unappreciated right

      i don't know

6.3.24  1:48 am   What do you think about the number 0?

      it's good for comedic value

6.2.24  11:35 pm   I gotta be honest dude ... idk if there can be equal visual/audio elements in a work. I think we like if one is dominant

      that's a reasonable conclusion

6.2.24  10:33 pm   Who is your favourite physicist/scientist???

      Sonic: The Hedgehog

6.2.24  9:40 pm   I really like fly around's video with the video motiff of having frames as animation scenes. What was the process of this idea building up in the video making process? Was it something you wanted to try for that video or something that developed during production?

      in that case, i was scrambling to get by. i'd just begun a race-schedule. chose, write, record, and produce a song-video every 3 weeks, or else. this was song 1. and as usual i blew most of the time working on the audio, leaving a miniscule amount of time for a video. a mad scramble

6.2.24  9:22 pm   what do you not mind the most about existing

      the most not-minded things are of course not on the mind. thus i can't seem to think of what that would be

6.2.24  8:01 pm   what if space had 2 dimensions and time had 2 as well

      that's like thinking of your next move in chess

6.2.24  6:09 pm   Why is the background of this page grey?

      to help calm you down

6.2.24  5:35 pm   How do I book a lengthy mentorship

      when would you like to start

6.2.24  4:34 pm   what you think about the number 247

      19 x 13

6.2.24  3:05 pm   what makes the bass so fun to play

      the rest of the instruments

6.2.24  1:37 pm   where do lyrics come from?

      music

6.2.24  12:32 pm   i keep procrastinating please advice

      first, find a shorter name for it

6.2.24  10:24 am   what baffles you

      touch screens in a car. think about it

6.2.24  10:08 am   whats with you and abraham lincoln

      it's just a common name

6.2.24  8:53 am   although you may definitely be unqualified to answer, do you have any advice on how i can fix my sleep schedule?

      no

6.2.24  5:09 am   could you write a whole song while skydiving?

      no

6.2.24  1:51 am   Do you like me even if you don't know me?

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

6.2.24  12:51 am   oh. a power chord plus a ninth is a neat little stack of 5ths. like a tasty lil double decker sandwich.

      that's true. i wonder if you've ever heard a string orchestra tuning up before their performance

6.2.24  12:49 am   its taking too long to make the things that i want to make

      that may be true

6.2.24  12:05 am   in response to the question "is it weird to be absurdly normal" you said that you'll have to perform some calculations. have you done those and come to a conclusion?

      no

6.1.24  11:53 pm   Is it okay if I listen to your music every second 

      i suppose so

6.1.24  11:48 pm   do you prefer the short questions or the long questions?

      i will wait patiently, until the day i receive, for the first time, a medium length question

6.1.24  11:24 pm   What is your definition of success?

      defining things, all day long

6.1.24  10:11 pm   was the music in "funny dolphin" improvised or written?

      improvised

6.1.24  9:42 pm   what rhymes with chimney

      almost everything

6.1.24  9:36 pm   oh wait i forgot to ask, how to change the world?

      first, figure out how you wish the world would be. then figure out how it is now. step 3 is to calculate the difference. step 4 will hopefully become apparent after you've done the first 3 steps

6.1.24  8:08 pm   Can I become professional at being job-less?

      you're gonna have to become an entrepreneur. go ahead and entreprendre some things

6.1.24  7:24 pm   who's that one guy from that one movie about that thing and that other thing where the stuff happens and stuff

      Tom Hanks

6.1.24  7:16 pm   bill tu parles français ?

      not usually, but i can understand it maybe 30%

6.1.24  6:18 pm   Is humor unfunny?

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

6.1.24  5:56 pm   What's your favorite film

      i haven't found one yet

6.1.24  5:54 pm   What should I draw?

      how about the future

6.1.24  5:28 pm   what is the ratio between weird questions and cool questions?

      1:1, but the complete picture is 1:1:1:1, which is weird:cool:neitherweirdnorcool:bothweirdandcool

6.1.24  5:02 pm   How does this thing work?

      you can ask questions with your mind

6.1.24  2:22 pm   Have you used duolingo?

     no

     What's your opinion/impression of it?

      none. i've heard the famous impression that it's silly, but i have never used it first hand

6.1.24  1:01 pm   how do I deal with the fear of starting something new

      there must be at least something not scary to start new

6.1.24  12:30 pm   the thing about autistic people is we tend to get really good at things. and sometimes those things include understanding other people & emotions. so then we fail all the tests, because they fail to account for the possibility that we got good at those things

      in that case, i wonder if an autistic person could get good at creating those tests

6.1.24  10:44 am   what's a normal amount of time to spend writing a 3 minute and 30 second song?

      a day, a week, 3 minutes and 30 seconds, ..... it's probably different for different people

6.1.24  1:56 am   What is your favourite hypothetical

      the truth

6.1.24  1:29 am   is there a way to do everything?

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

6.1.24  12:47 am   How old is your great aunts cousins grandmas daughter?

      i'm not sure

6.1.24  12:42 am   What should I think about on my nature walk?

      how about technology
